thread.title: Italy's top pastry chef sweetens trips to the bank

title: Italy's top pastry chef sweetens trips to the bank
text:
Italy's top pastry chef sweetens trips to the bank Thursday, March 15, 2018 - 01:15 
Italian pastry chef, Iginio Massari, is literally banking on his latest patisserie to set a new trend, opening a shop full of sweet delights inside a bank branch in central Milan. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Italian pastry chef, Iginio Massari, is literally banking on his latest patisserie to set a new trend, opening a shop full of sweet delights inside a bank branch in central Milan.
